column1: A.06a:  Outcomes of terrorism-related charges under terrorism legislation1
A.06b:  Outcomes of terrorism-related charges under non-terrorism legislation1
A.06c:  Total outcomes of charges2 for terrorism-related activity under terrorism and non-terrorism legislation1
Source: National Counter-Terrorism Police Operations Centre (NCTPOC)
1.  Data presented here are based on the latest position with each case as at the date of data provision from NCTPOC (30 July 2018).
2.  Includes all charges under terrorism legislation and under other legislation where considered by NCTPOC to be terrorism related.
3.  Refers to the substantive charge at indictment recorded by the Crown Prosecution Service.
4.  Difference in numbers between the totals for the 12 months ending 30 June 2017 and 30 June 2018.
5. Includes other cases/outcomes such as cautions, transfers to UK Border Agencies, the offender being circulated as wanted and extraditions.
6.  Excludes cases when a conviction was later quashed on appeal.
7.  Offences under terrorism legislation (see table A.08a for a further breakdown).
8.  Offences under Schedule 7 to the Terrorism Act 2000.
9.  Offences under non-terrorism legislation, where the offence is considered to be terrorism related (see table A.08b for a further breakdown).
